Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.4 Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.4.2 Akusalapada » 2.4.2.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
59.
1385Hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
60.
1386Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
